abstract: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index reached the milestone tentatively, on lazy trading and only barely above the 2,000 mark.
snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index reached the milestone tentatively, on lazy trading and only barely above the 2,000 mark.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index reached a milestone on Tuesday, closing above 2,000 for the first time ever, if just barely. It was a lazy day of trading that picked up on some encouraging signs in the United States economy, but not enough for sustained optimism in the market.

headline.main: For First Time, S.&P. 500 Closes Above 2,000
